sys_remote_update_set.description: - created the new "Incident Opened via Email - Xactware" notification - disabled the "Request Approved" notification - modified the "Create Incident" Inbound Email Action to default the assignment group to the caller company's default group if the Service Desk email address could not be deciphered - include the new Group and Group Type record as well
sys_remote_update_set.name: 2013-04-08 New email notification
